description:
Vander was on hiatus and shot this peep video a while back.
He wasn't happy with the camera shake, so didn't want to send it. He finally sent it to me, and I was totally happy with it! It is a gorgeous homemade peep video! His location is amazing!
You can tell Vander has an eye for porn and what turns guys on. Pissing, taking off his shoes, some major ass play. There is a really beautiful piss shot after the video ends. It feels like to art to me!
The locations seems challenging, but he is clearly turned-on!
For a model that has been with me for years, this is simply an amazing peep! A new fresh way to get intimate with him!
I am a big fan of solos, despite many viewers having disdain, but even if you aren't a fan, it is a something to add to your collection.
And if you like guys pissing, or even outdoor video, you probably better join and add it to your "guy's pissing" stash!
title: Vander - peep
